snippet.title: Undertale Green: The Pre-Show | UNDEREVENT 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
We're excited to unveil Undertale Green: The Pre-Show's first official trailer at UNDEREVENT 2024!

In this ~60 minute prequel to Olive's grand adventure in Undertale Green, we follow a much younger set of characters in a much more intimate setting.

Olive and their sister Chai go through the motions after school, however things take a turn for the strange as rainy day turns to pouring night...

Experience a one-shot adventure setting up the vibrant characters of Undertale Green through a drab snippet of the surface! Interact with an unorthodox battle system, make new friends, and prepare for the long road ahead.

Look forward to a 2025 release! 

For more information, subscribe to us here or follow the project on:
GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/undertalegreenpreshow/893794
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/F9CFDZjsN4

Trailer Credits:
Hendog30 - Coder, Editor
Nic - Artist, Editor
Casual - Artist, Writer
MpD - Composer
Traxter - Coder

Watch UNDEREVENT 2024: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ho5jkOfUFtY

*Please note that we are not associated with Migs' Undertale Green or any other fan projects. We encourage you to give them your support as well! 💚 

#undertale #undertalegreen #underevent
